Service Details: - Develops and champions approval and implementation of long-term plans to advance community sustainability undertaken in consultation with the community, stakeholders and interdepartmental staff- Coordinates planning projects, heritage, housing, official community plan, population statistics and sustainability- Provides an overview of demographic and social trends and highlights successes and potential future challenges in the community
